title: Run pre-flight checks for FO-03
description:
Verify the codebase is in a healthy state before starting FO-03 implementation.

Commands to run:
1. npm run build - verify production build works
2. npm run lint - ensure no lint errors
3. node --import tsx e2e/fo-02.test.ts - verify existing E2E tests pass

Document any pre-existing failures.
acceptance_criteria: npm run build succeeds; npm run lint passes; E2E test passes or known failures documented
closed_reason: Pre-flight checks passed: npm run build (success), npm run lint (no errors), E2E tests fo-02.test.ts (all passed - 3 batch iterative flow with 30 affirmations). Codebase is healthy for FO-03 implementation.
